features: 46'' Long Handle Broom: Optional extension pole makes the broom length from 34 to 46 inches, People can choose the appropriate broom length according to their height. The broom long handle allows you to stand upright for comfortable sweeping, without bending anymore and the spiral joint is deeper and assemble tightly, Say goodbye to loose handles.

Dust Pan Rubber Lip: Broom and dustpan set for home the design for the flat rubber lip, and it creates a strong seal between the surface and dustpan. Therefore, dust is never swept underneath, for maximum dirt collection. The dustpan stick also consists of 2 and 3 segments respectively, length from 32 to 45 inches, 11.8 inches wide, can hold more garbage.

Self-Cleaning Dustpan Teeth: Indoor broom built-in scraper and comb/Teeth for easy Clean Broom into Dustpan, Clean Pet Hair and Human Hair with one Pull on the Teeth, no need to worry about cleaning up hair and confetti on the kitchen broom. So you can get rid of dust and Pet Hair on the broom without using your hands.

Compact Stand-up Storage: Broom and dustpan set is a hanger on the top of the dustpan handle for broom and dustpan, just clip the broom to the dustpan handle, the brooms and dustpans sets are collapsible for home, camping to save storage space.

Easy Cleaning: Broom with dustpan can be installed without obstacles. Simple and light, you can easily complete the cleaning work indoors and outdoors. Whether it's kitchen gadgets, hair in the living room, or garden leaves, you can quickly clean them.The outdoor broom is made of 4 layers of high-toughness PET bristles with a 45° bevel, which can deeply clean the dust on the floor and clean all kinds of dead corners.
body.description: Our Broom And Dustpan Can Solve All Your Troubles Coyacool large size and durable broom and dustpan sweeper set is your perfect choice. This sturdy broom and dustpan set is Easy Assembling, 46" Long handle allows you to stand upright for comfortable sweeping. No MORE BENDING! The broom and dustpan set for home have a rubber lip that completely fits the ground and can easily capture tiny dust and little paper into the pan and The teeth of the dustpan so that you can get rid of dirt on the broom without using your hands.

Easily sweep dust and hair, the bristles of the broom will not absorb water, so it can washable and extend the life of the kitchen broom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this broom set, I use it every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect in RV
reviews.reviewText: Work perfect in the RV, were space is at a premium.You can break it down, if you need to store it in a small space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very poorly made
reviews.reviewText: I could get better quality from the $.99 store. I would not recommend this product. Dustpan will not stand on its own. This will break in the first week of my husband using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I don't have to bend over
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to put together and I like it cause I don't have to bend over

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the best
reviews.reviewText: I don’t like the broom itself (it’s at a weird angle) and the dust pan does not want to sit upright when the broom is attached

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good dust pan
reviews.reviewText: This is a great tool for sweeping up light floor debris. Don't use it for heavy rocks and blocks of grease or whatever. I had a coworker do that, and though it worked once, it doesn't look like it'll work for long on heavy stuff.Great for general dust piles though, which was my intent for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: not going to even bother to return this - the picture shows the broom being straight but it's angled which makes it really annoying to place back into the dustbin. Really flimsy and cheap - the dustbin constantly falls over even when against a wall. Looks good in photos only.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the comb on the dust pan never leaves hair behind in the broom doesn’t free
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to assemble but sometimes when you’re using it it loosens I put a little glue in my connections so it stays permanently but if you plan on taking it apart again I wouldn’t do that. Easy to use with one hand not heavy at all
